name: iStylista
tag_list: personal-stylist, personal-shopper, designer-womenswear, online-personal-stylist, free-style-advice, online-personal-shopper, designer-clothes, designer-fashion, designer-shoes, designer-dresses
overview:
iStylista.com is an online personal stylist service managed exclusively by professional stylists, not complex algorythms. The stylists hand select only the finest on-trend ladies designerwear to members body shapes, colouring, boddy niggles, size etc. This means that registered users only see what suits them and not what does not.

iStylista uses an affiliate program and uses data feeds of clothing items from some of the leading online designer e-tailers such as My-Wardrobe, Start London and Matches Fashion.

iStylista membership is entirely free for women. Ladies become a member by cometing a simple questionnaire about themselves. Once fully registered a member will be allocated their own personal Online Changing Room where they can view their profiled products.

Members can select how often they want to be told about the latest products (via email) added to the site and can return to the site 24/7.

iStylista market’s itself as the ultimate fashion convenience service for women who love designer fashion but don’t have time to shop or need a little assistance from an expert eye.
